TopicTitle: How did you come to get your screen name?

Articles.Content: A result of my alma mater. For logins they used the first five letters of our last names, then the first initial. If wasn't available, they added a number to the end of it. I've stuck with it since.
I like pie. It is simple, i just love pie.
Candle Nine is my stage name when I do music. candlesayshi comes from the David Bowie song "Everyone Says Hi"

Devo, a guild I used to run in Star Wars Galaxies, and Gen, short for Genesis, a 2D morpg engine I work on when Im not learning how to make kerbal mods, which made devogeninteractive.com ive just used it for that long now, I could'nt think of anything else

First started internet gaming on Flight Simulator, and, having loved Ace Combat 4, I chose the name Yellow-13. Then, on Gamespy, I changed to Mobius1Defected, then back to Yellow-13, then changed to WuLF, SwiftWuLF^, then Wolfy, WolfyBoi, and now Ivan Teh Fennec Fawks.
Holy COW, that is a tremendous load of necromancy! Be sure to check the last poster, and don't reply right away to search results.

I play lot of FPS and i needed nicknames for networks like BattleNet and Steam.So i edited name of episodes of old good Doom II and added CR2(after my favorite shooter Crysis 3).But i'm still using Martin + VD(Vellocity down).
I was always a fan of the Spy vs Spy comics from ages ago. They were made by MAD, so madspy was born. I also use themadspy300 and madspy300 when madspy is taken

Funny enough, I took my name from old HL2 and HL1 console commands. My first name was "kill" second was buddha, third was from npc_create npc_monk (father grigori). But after that, I switched to Monkatraz (due to crysis 2, Alcatraz, Monkatraz) and then Monkthespy for other things like Minecraft because I played a lot of spy in TF2
My username on most things has been Awesomo204 since I was ten-ish and I decided I wanted a change.

Holy COW, that is a tremendous load of necromancy! Be sure to check the last poster, and don't reply right away to search results.

But is it really necro posting when 20 people respond? I call that reviving a thread

Edited October 13, 2012 by Devo

Tim_Barrett because that's actually my name - I don't like to be called and call others by screen names chats too often.

It started with minecraft, where I couldn't use spaces for my name.

In primary school, when we used the computers we were all assigned random 4-digit passwords. The first one I received was szpw, and I began using that as my username for many things. I liked the sound of it, and the fact that it was never taken. When it is though, I use szpw7.
I was creating my email account at age 11 and I picked this name. I use it for pretty much everything on the internet.
I called Google "Giggle" after I saw that in the game "Learn to fly 2" or something like that. Then I just added plex so it's like googolplex.

Not on this forum but in games I use ImTheCaptin.

Here is how I got to ImTheCaptin

once cometh birth age of 11 I became massive noob playing half life one online

my first name was frozenfish but people either called me frozen or fish and not frozenfish... some thing had to be done

so I changed it to the most responsible thing I could think of I'mTheAdmin

I kept this name until I played counter strike source when I found that with this name I could claim to be the admin (yes noobish)

After much greifing on zombie server I had to constantly change my user name and rejoin the server so at that time I had a TON of usernames (still noob)

but my main screen name stayed I'mTheAdmin

Until I shed the bounds of being a noob and started playing garrys mod (How did I stop being a noob in garrys mod is anyones guess)

So hence forth I stopped claiming I was an admin but kept the name of old time sakes

however this caused much confusion because people would call for ADMIN and It would seem like they are talking to me and not actual calling for an ADMIN

at some-point a real admin threaten to ban if I didn't change my name so I changed it to ImTheCaptin

the reason why it is captin and not captain is because I hate it when people say 'cappy-tan'

so yup that how I got my screen name

(noob no longer)

I was watching one of my best TV programs

I've been on the net since I was a wee lad, around about the age of 7. In the year 1997.

My first 2 loves in life where those Military Flash Cards you could get from National Geographics Infomercials.

And Rock & Roll.

So when I was in my Teens I came up with my first Screen Name, which you can still find me around the net with. :Comsquaddelta:

Meaning: "Communications Squad Delta"

After try the KSP Demo though, I really wanted to change things up and Blend a few things.

First off I love Rock and Roll.

Alice Cooper, Damn Yankees, Dire Straights, and Ted Nugent to name the few.

So I thought to myself how do I blend Space Simulation and Rock'n Roll.

Then it hit me.

The Darkness

There hit: "I believe in a thing called love"

Has everything I love about Rock N' Roll and Space

The Kraken, Marshall Amps, Ear Shattering Vocals and Various Other Items.

So there you go I am "The Darkness"

Ah good ole GOOMH, I also go by Topgun09 and TG09 and that's because I wanted for a while to be a flyboy plus I thought I was the top gun meaning like a sniper in CoD. Now GOOMH is an acronym for:

Get

Out

Of

My

House

I used to by getoutofmyhouse on the CoD forums when I was a CoD Fanboi on the Wii and when I finally got my 360 and I couldn't do Topgun and I didn't want getoutofmyhouse in it's full form so I shorten it to just GOOMH and been using it ever since. BTW it's pronounced GOOM with a silent h and NOT GOOMEH or GOOMAH or GOOM-H. I kinda like it better than TG since well it's unique and no one I know has it and I always can use it unlike TG.

Back when I was an annoying little kid I was one of those "SO RANDOM!!!111!!! XD" people. So when I was nine and I created a Roblox account (eugh) I chose NUTTY555 as a username. Because I had a stupid obsession with acorns. When I got Portal (Best Valve game ever), I had to make a name for my Steam account, I took the Y off of my name and changed it to: nutt_005. I eventually decided I didn't like this when I got Garry's Mod and changed it to Nutt007. (So yeah, the "007" after my name has nothing to do with James Bond. ) That's the username I still use today.
Mine is my first name if you couldn't guess that and 21B ( They switched it back to 12B) was my MOS when I was in the army.

It's the name of a character I role in one of my short-productions, since then I use this name very often, before that I just used my name (Misac) and everybody think it was a random screen name.

It's him (or me)

well mine was when i first started playing runescape when i was 6-8ish which i had decided on zapy, but that wasn't available so it suggested zapy97, and i took that and at the time i didn't realise it was the last 2 digits in year of birth (1997) so since then i have been rolling as zapy97
needed a new name for a wow paladin, and I remembered the diablo 2 builds: liberator, templar, vindicator. people often think I got this name from HON, which annoys the feces out of me

This is my first attempt at a song post, I'm nervous but I'm excited at the same time, so I'm just going to start talking about how I got my username.

I love cats. I love every kind of cat. I just want to hug all them, but I can't, I need every cat. I have so much cats. So anyway, I am a cat lover and I like apples. I'm sorry, I'm thinking about cats again. I really love cats. I'm thinking cats again, and again, and again and again and again. I think about how many are that creative and how I'm better than them. I think about how dumb they are, and how they're long, and the numbers and the memes. I'm just awesome, and I'm creative, and I think I'm really great, and I want to be recognized.

I just love me, and you'd love me to be on a rainbow and in your bed and I just want us to roll around; to roll around. Sorry, I'm getting creative. I love cats, I love every kind of cat.

They misspelled klepto, so instead I replaced all of the c's in my name with k's. Creative, right? I also have a huge lore and story behind my name, but for now I'm just awesome, mmk?

Edited October 16, 2012 by KleptoKat

This username was chosen, because it was named after the mission in the Demo that would take the most time (but is arguably not the hardest), to crash into the sun! However, I don't think I have done it with stock yet...

Some other of my usernames have interesting etymologies too. On some sites, I am Grind3r, named because when I play video games, 99.99% of the time I spend is grinding. On other sites, I am Mossstonelover64 - that name comes from Minecraft (Moss Stone, then the number for a full stack. Another username of mine, I won't tell for reasons which are also secret. Finally, on one site, I'm ThePaleDayFalls. I'll let you guess the etymology for that...
